text: And he went thence and found Jonadab the son of Rechab coming to meet him; and he 10. 15 Gr. blessed him.saluted him, and Ju said to him, Is thy heart right with my heart, as my heart is with thy heart? And Jonadab said, It is. And Ju said, If it is then, give me thy hand. And he gave him his hand, and he took him up to him 10. 15 Gr. upon.into the chariot.
